Articles.Content:
Kerbals!

The KETSA (KErbonautical Triangularia Space Agency) proudly presents a short compilation of the socalled unmanned "Nosiness" missions.

Details:

What at first was planned as a row of missions up to 7 fligths turned to a pizza- and coke-depeleting count of 14 liftoffs until the mission goals were accomplished. Enjoy!

Nosiness 1, Aslaug I rocket with Kerbosphere I payload. Suborbital trajectotry with Ap of 94.344 meters, mission succeeded

Nosiness 2, Aslaug I rocket with Kerbosphere I payload. Suborbital trajectotry with Ap of 324.129 meters, mission failed

Nosiness 3, Aslaug II rocket with Kerbosphere I payload. Suborbital trajectotry with Ap of 80.078 meters, mission failed

Nosiness 4, Aslaug IIa rocket with Kerbosphere I payload. Unable to leave atmosphere, mission failed

Nosiness 5, Aslaug III rocket with Kerbosphere I payload. Satellite Advance I depolyed in equatorial Kerbin orbit, mission succeeded

Nosiness 6, Aslaug III rocket with Kerbosphere I payload. Satellite Advance II depolyed in polar Kerbin orbit, mission succeeded

Nosiness 7, Aslaug III rocket with Kerbosphere II payload. Suborbital trajectory with Ap of 401.205 meters, mission failed

Nosiness 8, Aslaug III rocket with Kerbosphere IIa payload. Vessel destroyed at staging last stage, mission failed

Nosiness 9, Aslaug IV rocket with Kerbosphere III payload. Satellite Advance III deployed in random Kerbin orbit after last stage detonation, mission partially succeeded

Nosiness 10, Aslaug IVa rocket with Kerbocube I payload. Staging test flight, mission succeeded

Nosiness 11, Aslaug IVa rocket with Kerbocube I payload. Electricity shortage, mission aborted

Nosiness 12, Aslaug IVb rocket with Kerbocube Ia payload. Satellite Kersat I deployed in kerbostationary orbit, mission succeeded

Nosiness 13, Aslaug IVb rocket with Kerbocube Ia payload. Satellite Goofy I deployed in mÃƒÂ¼nar orbit, mission succeeded

Nosiness 14, Aslaug IVb rocket with Kerbocube Ia payload. Satellite Goofy II deployed in minmÃƒÂ¼sian orbit, mission succeeded

http://www.crosswood.de/downloads/ksp/KETSA%20-%20Nosiness.mp4

-Kia

Edited June 23, 2013 by Kialar
